title: Ex-NBA star Amar'e Stoudemire charged with punching daughter
description: Amar'e Stoudemire is facing a misdemeanor battery charge.

title: Jesuits ask victims to come forward in artist abuse case
description: A famous Jesuit artist was essentially let off the hook by the Vatican twice.

title: Prosecutor: Arkansas police recruit's death was accidental
description: An Arkansas police recruit died while attending a law enforcement academy.

title: Ex-Mafia boss 'Cadillac Frank' Salemme dies in prison at 89
description: He was serving a life sentence for the 1993 killing of a Boston nightclub owner.

title: Faculty: Purdue Northwest CEO must resign for racist remarks
description: Purdue Northwest CEO and Chancellor Thomas Keon mocked Asian languages.

title: Liz Cheney's mission: Keep Donald Trump out of the White House
description: Outgoing Rep. Liz Cheney risked her political career in making a criminal case against Donald Trump in the aftermath of Jan. 6. She makes a last stand Monday.

title: EU reaches deal on emissions trading, social climate fund
description: It will reform the EU's trading system for greenhouse gas emissions.

title: These are the frigid conditions left in the wake of a country-wide winter storm
description: The winter solstice is days away, but frigid temperatures are already here for much of the U.S.

title: What it would mean for the Jan. 6 committee to make criminal referrals
description: The Jan. 6 committee is likely to send criminal referrals to the Justice Department for former President Donald Trump and some of his key allies this week

title: Child dies after migrant boat overturns off Italian island
description: Italian news reports say a 2-year-old girl has died after being rescued by the Italian coast guard near a Mediterranean island, along with dozens of other migrants

title: Texas mayor declares state of emergency over migrant swell
description: The mayor of a Texas border city has declared a state of emergency over concerns about the community’s ability to handle an anticipated influx of migrants across the Southern border

title: Cecily Strong leaves Saturday Night Live after 11 seasons
description: After 11 seasons, Cecily Strong has said farewell to “Saturday Night Live."

title: Sam Bankman-Fried expected to waive extradition from Bahamas: Sources
description: Sam Bankman-Fried, who is facing charges in the U.S. following the collapse of his cryptocurrency exchange, FTX, is prepared to waive extradition from the Bahamas.

title: Texas Gov. Greg Abbott says end of Title 42 will bring 'total chaos'
description: Texas is part of a coalition of Republican-leaning states that has pushed to keep Title 42 in place

title: ALS patients contend with $158K price tag on new drug
description: For two years, Becky Mourey pushed the Food and Drug Administration to approve an experimental drug for her Lou Gehrig’s disease

title: Anti-abortion priest Pavone defrocked for blasphemous posts
description: The Vatican has defrocked an anti-abortion U.S. priest, Frank Pavone, for what it said were “blasphemous communications on social media” as well as “persistent disobedience” of his bishop

title: France and Argentina to face off in World Cup final on Sunday
description: The World Cup final today between France and Argentina is scheduled to start at 10 a.m. ET at Lusail Stadium in Qatar.

title: UK sending 1,200 troops to fill in as ambulance crews strike
description: The British government says it will dispatch 1,200 troops to fill in for striking ambulance drivers and border staff as multiple public sector unions walk off the job in the week before Christmas

title: Fuel tanker tunnel blast kills at least 19 in Afghanistan
description: A local official in Afghanistan says a fuel tanker explosion in a tunnel has killed at least 19 people and injured 32

title: 3 escaped chimpanzees recaptured in Sweden; 4 shot dead
description: The surviving animals are now being looked after.

title: Pope wrote resignation note in case of health impediment
description: He wrote a resignation letter in case medical problems impede him.

title: Mother, stepfather arrested as FBI, police search for missing 11-year-old
description: The mother and stepfather of Madalina Cojocari, 11, who has been missing for weeks, were arrested for allegedly failing to report to her disappearance, police said.

title: Key Ukrainian city's rapid fall leaves unanswered questions
description: About two dozen Ukrainian civilian volunteers were killed on March 1 by Russian troops who entered the southern city of Kherson

title: 2 teens dead, multiple injured in shooting over social media dispute
description: Two people were killed and multiple injured in a shooting at an Atlanta apartment complex Saturday.

title: Student tracking Elon Musk’s jet program will continue to do so
description: Despite a threat of legal action from Elon Musk, Jack Sweeney said he believes in the value of tracking private jets of celebrities and thinks Musk is bluffing.

title: N. Korea fires ballistic missile into waters off east coast
description: Three days ago, North Korea said it tested a “high-thrust solid-fuel motor.”

title: WATCH:  Christmas light show that almost wasn’t
description: Bob Mangan’s annual light show in North Ridgeville, Ohio, almost did not happen until his neighbors let him know how important it is to the community and he went all out.
